Name: 10 Second Shuriken
About the game: 10 Second Shuriken is a fps platformer. Speed run and master levels within 10 seconds destroying all the enemies to get the fastest time. Features A game where you only have 10 seconds to beat the level Jump and shoot your way through 40 levels taking you from grasslands, to laser and ice worlds. Slice enemies with your samurai sword Collect and use power ups like teleportation shurikens and jet packs to help you destroy your enemies A feeling of satisfaction when you kill all the enemies so fast that you get a 3 star rating Steam achievements Dodge Lasers, jump on trampolines, and destroy odd shaped enemies
